text: Prince Harry will be embarking on one of life ’ s great adventures by tying the knot with humanitarian and actress Meghan Markle. Last month, thousands of people signed a petition demanding that the royal family fund the wedding themselves and not take any money from the British taxpayer. With that in mind, the net worth of the royal family and Prince Harry have becoming interesting topics of conversation.
